text: Kolhan division is one of the five divisions in the Indian state of Jharkhand. The division comprises three districts: East Singhbhum, Seraikela Kharsawan district, and West Singhbhum. The three districts were earlier a part of South Chotanagpur division. The headquarters of the division is Chaibasa. ==Languages== ==References== Category:Geography of Jharkhand Category:Divisions of Jharkhand
title: Kolhan division
